XmlSaxHandler Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

GisXmlSaxHandler defines the GIS SAX Handler callback interface. It is not an interface in the strict sense, since each function has a default implementation that does nothing. Implementors can override these callbacks to customize the handling of XML fragments parsed by GisXmlReader.


Public Member Functions

virtual System::Void XmlCharacters (NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlSaxContext *context, System::String *characters)
 Default Sax callback that is called when the GisXmlReader reads a chunk of simple content for the current element. Does nothing by default. This function may be called multiple times for the same element, if the the content is long. Applications must not make any assumptions about the chunk size or number of chunks for each element.
virtual System::Void XmlEndDocument (NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlSaxContext *context)
 Default Sax callback that is called when the GisXmlReader finishes reading an XML document. Does nothing.
virtual System::Boolean XmlEndElement (NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlSaxContext *context, System::String *resourceLocation, System::String *name, System::String *qualifiedName)
 Default Sax callback that is called when the GisXmlReader reads the end tag for an XML element in the document. Does nothing.
 XmlSaxHandler (System::IntPtr unmanaged, System::Boolean autoDelete)
 XmlSaxHandler ()
virtual NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::IXmlSaxHandler * XmlStartDocument (NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlSaxContext *context)
 Default Sax callback that is called when the GisXmlReader starts reading an XML document. Does nothing.
virtual NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::IXmlSaxHandler * XmlStartElement (NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlSaxContext *context, System::String *resourceLocation, System::String *name, System::String *qualifiedName, NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlAttributeCollection *attributes)
 Default Sax callback that is called when the GisXmlReader reads the start tag for an XML element in the document. Does nothing.
